title: Having a real tough time connecting.
body: After patch 8.11, I’m having such a hard time loading into games. Anyone else or just me?

replies.body: same i keep getting booted out of loading screen even when i'm at 100%. didn't have this problem earlier today but then Pyke was released and i can't connect now.

> [{quoted}](name=Ivern a Tree Guy,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=OlGmxswx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-01T02:31:47.769+0000)
>
> same i keep getting booted out of loading screen even when i'm at 100%. didn't have this problem earlier today but then Pyke was released and i can't connect now.

Yep, exactly my problem.
